name: Keeper
headline: We make software for bookkeepers.
description:
Keeper makes software to help bookkeepers manage their clients' back-office.

We write the same kind of software that venture-backed bookkeepers like Pilot write internally, but instead of doing bookkeeping, we sell that software to the 1.5M bookkeepers across the US.

founders.name: Ben Stein, Founder
founders.description:
CEO of Keeper

Previously:
* CFO @ Mira (enterprise AR startup)
* Operations @ SpaceX
* Business Analytics @ Amazon

founders.name: Kenny Song, Founder
founders.description: CTO of Keeper. Loves bookkeeping, React, and rugby.

# Close the books in half the time
Keeper is the leading QuickBooks and Xero-integrated bookkeeping practice management tool. 
[Get Started](https://www.keeper.app/<https:/keeper.app/book-demo/>)
Get started
5.0
Rating on G2
  * ![bookkeeper-practice-management-software-screenshot](https://www.keeper.app/wp-content/uploads/2024/08/Product-Close-Dashboard-Highlight.jpg)
  * ![](https://www.keeper.app/wp-content/uploads/2024/08/Frame-14301058397.png)
  * ![](https://www.keeper.app/wp-content/uploads/2024/08/Frame-14301058398.png)
  * ![](https://www.keeper.app/wp-content/uploads/2024/08/Frame-14301058399.png)


Trusted by thousands of bookkeepers and accountants
![](https://www.keeper.app/wp-content/uploads/2024/08/8-1-e1724437891571-300x134.png)
![](https://www.keeper.app/wp-content/uploads/2024/08/7-1-e1724437867882-300x101.png)

## Seamless communication
![Product - bookkeeping dashboard](https://www.keeper.app/wp-content/uploads/2024/08/Content-2.jpg)
### Faster responses. Less effort.
Ask questions about transactions directly from the bank feed
Schedule automated client reminders (by email or text)
Reclassify transactions in Keeper, based on client responses
Manage client communication in a secure, custom-branded portal
[Explore Client Portal](https://www.keeper.app/<https:/keeper.app/custom-branded-client-portal/>)
“Not only has Client Portal saved us valuable time, but our clients have embraced the new platform, which has quickly become the preferred mode of communication.”
![](https://www.keeper.app/wp-content/uploads/2024/08/1-1.png)
Jelena Arcula
Books LA, Inc.
## Automated file review
### Review your clients books with speed and accuracy every time.
Automatically catch and correct common coding errors
Instantly sync all changes back to QuickBooks/Xero
Review P&L reports at the vendor-level 
Standardize reviews across your firm with customizable templates
[Explore File Reviews](https://www.keeper.app/<https:/keeper.app/integrated-file-review-tools/>)
“Keeper helps us keep way better track of everything going on for each client and allows the staff to do the majority of their own work before final sign off by a manager.”
![](https://www.keeper.app/wp-content/uploads/2024/08/2.png)
Katie Hanna
Details Matter Bookkeeping
![Product - Automated File Review](https://www.keeper.app/wp-content/uploads/2024/08/Product-Automated-File-Review.jpg)
## 1099 problems, solved
![Product - 1099 Problems](https://www.keeper.app/wp-content/uploads/2024/08/1099-Problems-Image.jpg)
### Track vendors and request W-9s throughout the year, all in Keeper.
Identify vendors that may require 1099s and are missing W-9s
Request those W-9s directly from the vendor
Export and upload 1099 data to your favorite filing tools
[Explore 1099s](https://www.keeper.app/<https:/keeper.app/track-and-prepare-1099s/>)
“Keeper helps us catch missing W-9s immediately. We expect to cut down the amount of time we spend chasing W-9s at the end of the year by two-thirds or more. ”
![](https://www.keeper.app/wp-content/uploads/2024/08/3.png)
Pam Stocks
Owner/CEO, On The Books Consulting
## Custom management reports
### Deliver more than just P&L and Balance Sheet to help your clients actually understand their financials.
Start with a one page executive summary 
Customize KPIs and visuals for each client
Publish reports directly to the Client Portal 
[Explore Reporting](https://www.keeper.app/<https:/keeper.app/custom-management-reports/>)
“The reports are my favorite feature of Keeper because they bring the most value to my clients, but all the features are valuable to myself, my team, and my clients.” 
![](https://keeper.app/wp-content/uploads/2024/08/4.png)
Cheyenne Weaver
Veterinary Bookkeeper
![Custom Accounting Reports](https://www.keeper.app/wp-content/uploads/2024/08/Frame-1430105842.png)
## Task management
![Product - June Task Management](https://www.keeper.app/wp-content/uploads/2024/08/June-Task-Management.jpg)
### Ensure no work falls through the cracks and build out your ideal workflow.
Create & track recurring or one-off tasks
Organize tasks with sections and tags
Track client information and team progress in a single, firm-wide view
[Explore Task Management](https://www.keeper.app/<https:/keeper.app/task-management/>)
“The best part is that Keeper keeps me accountable and organized without any input from my side. No more creating tasks and due dates. Absolutely recommend it to every bookkeeper out there.”
![](https://www.keeper.app/wp-content/uploads/2024/08/5.png)
Kathy Kowalczyk
Go Bookkeeping
![Product - Receipts highlight](https://www.keeper.app/wp-content/uploads/2024/08/Product-Receipts-highlight.jpg)
## Integrated receipt management
NEW
A faster, more organized way to manage receipts for your team and your clients.
Easily collect documents from your clients (by text, email, or direct upload) 
Review and match transactions directly from the ledger 
Process receipts using rules and AI
## Bookkeeping practice management software built to reduce your tech stack
Integrates with **QuickBooks**
and **Xero**
### Consolidate your work
Your firm's single source of truth. Consolidate your tools into a platform built specifically for you.
![](https://www.keeper.app/wp-content/uploads/2024/07/Frame-26092571.png)
[Browse integrations](https://www.keeper.app/<https:/keeper.app/integrations/>)
### Integrate your tools
Deep integration with all the tools you know and love with our deeply customizable Zapier integration.
![](https://cdn.worldvectorlogo.com/logos/zapier-2.svg)
[View our Zapier guide](https://www.keeper.app/<https:/keeper.app/integrations/>)
## 
And so much more we know you’ll love
Plus, we’re always building and improving based on customer feedback.
[Make a feature request](https://www.keeper.app/<http:/keeperapp.canny.io>)
### Time tracking
### Custom reports
### Integrated email
### Client tags
### Internal commenting and team chat
### Daily digest emails
### Userpermissions
### Customizable client properties
### Kanban client view
### Zapier integrations

## Don’t just take it from us
Learn why thousands of bookkeepers and accountants trust us, and how others have utilized our practice management software to improve their firms.
[See all testimonials](https://www.keeper.app/<https:/keeper.app/reviews/>)
[![Jason Staats Demo Day - Keeper](https://www.keeper.app/wp-content/uploads/2024/11/Jason-Staats-Demo-Thumbnail.jpg)](https://www.keeper.app/<https:/www.youtube.com/watch?v=Nq39HNAAI8w>)
### If you are a bookkeeper, this dashboard right now is probably the most useful single dashboard view in our profession"
![](https://www.keeper.app/wp-content/uploads/2024/07/Rectangle-94312.png)
Jason Staats
@Jason.CPA
### The more we use Keeper, the more I wonder how we managed without it!"
![](https://www.keeper.app/wp-content/uploads/2024/07/Rectangle-94313.png)
Marlena Jones
Spring Accounting
![](https://www.keeper.app/wp-content/uploads/2024/07/Frame-1430105863.png)
### [Join Facebook community group](https://www.keeper.app/<https:/www.facebook.com/groups/keeperusers>)[Discuss, debate and share ideas with 5k+ fellow bookkeepers.](https://www.keeper.app/<https:/www.facebook.com/groups/keeperusers>)
![](https://www.keeper.app/wp-content/uploads/2024/07/Rectangle-34647409.png)
### [Tune into our monthly webinars](https://www.keeper.app/<https:/us02web.zoom.us/webinar/register/WN_bw-SRNzMQ2eLVzNmND8-tA?fbclid=IwAR3ipv91Po474-Y9XoX1vv7qAsEWPswmor-K0LPc2v5ms4La7Iqf7UhjWog#/registration>)[They’re always the last Tuesday of every month at 11 AM EST.](https://www.keeper.app/<https:/us02web.zoom.us/webinar/register/WN_bw-SRNzMQ2eLVzNmND8-tA?fbclid=IwAR3ipv91Po474-Y9XoX1vv7qAsEWPswmor-K0LPc2v5ms4La7Iqf7UhjWog#/registration>)
## Run a better month-end close
[Start now](https://www.keeper.app/<https:/keeper.app/book-demo/>)
One app to run your bookkeeping business. Communicate with clients, catch coding errors, track KPIs, and manage your work.
[![](https://www.keeper.app/wp-content/uploads/2025/02/keeper_logo_purple.png)](https://www.keeper.app/<https:/keeper.app/>)

  * [Client Portal](https://www.keeper.app/<https:/keeper.app/custom-branded-client-portal/>)

## Seamless communication
![Product - bookkeeping dashboard⟨24⟩]
### Faster responses. Less effort.
Ask questions about transactions directly from the bank feed
Schedule automated client reminders (by email or text)
Reclassify transactions in Keeper, based on client responses
Manage client communication in a secure, custom-branded portal
Explore Client Portal⟨3⟩
“Not only has Client Portal saved us valuable time, but our clients have embraced the new platform, which has quickly become the preferred mode of communication.”
![](https://www.keeper.app/wp-content/uploads/2024/08/1-1.png)
Jelena Arcula
Books LA, Inc.
## Automated file review
### Review your clients books with speed and accuracy every time.
Automatically catch and correct common coding errors
Instantly sync all changes back to QuickBooks/Xero
Review P&L reports at the vendor-level 
Standardize reviews across your firm with customizable templates

generated_description:
### Overview of Keeper

**Keeper** is a fintech startup dedicated to streamlining the workflow of bookkeepers through innovative software solutions. Established in 2020 and part of Y Combinator's S21 batch, Keeper is headquartered in Austin, TX, with a growing team of 48 employees. The company's mission is straightforward: "We make software for bookkeepers." 

### What Keeper Does

Originally designed to help bookkeeping firms manage their back-office operations, Keeper offers software that mirrors internal tools used by venture-backed services like Pilot, but sells it directly to the 1.5 million bookkeepers in the U.S. Their software is integrated with popular accounting platforms like QuickBooks and Xero, making it a valuable platform for bookkeeping practices.

### Key Features

1. **Client Portal**: A custom-branded interface for seamless client communication.
2. **File Reviews**: Tools to automatically check and correct bookkeeping entries.
3. **Receipt Management**: New features to help bookkeepers handle receipts more efficiently.
4. **1099 Processing**: Built-in tracking for independent contractors and their W-9s.
5. **CRM**: Client relationship management capabilities to help bookkeepers stay organized.
6. **Custom Reporting**: Detail-oriented management reports to provide clients with actionable insights.
7. **Task Management**: A structured approach to tracking work and ensuring deadlines are met.

### Customer-Focused Approach

Keeper emphasizes continuous improvement based on customer feedback and frequently updates its platform with new features that are directly inspired by its user community. 

### Recognition and Growth

Keeper has garnered a strong reputation in the industry, currently boasting a perfect 5.0 rating on G2. Its software is trusted by thousands of accountants and bookkeepers who rely on it to manage their practices more effectively.

### Get Involved

If you’re a bookkeeper looking to optimize your operations, Keeper provides resources such as customer stories, testimonials, and regular webinars. You can even book a demo on their [website](https://www.keeper.app).

In summary, Keeper is not just a software company; it's a partner for bookkeepers aiming to enhance their operational efficiency and client service. With a clear focus on the unique challenges that bookkeepers face, Keeper stands ready to transform the bookkeeping landscape.
